column1:
I plugged a USB in first try AMA.


https://youtu.be/6e1GiqbV_Xo Video evidence we did it
I won the green card lottery and am now a US permanent resident. AMA!
My average post gets 3 up votes and I have a good comment every once in a while. AMA
AMA, then edit your comment after I respond to make me sound insane.

I manage a seedy motel on the edge of town, AMA.


Manager here for 5 years, under two ownerships that refuse to put money into the place. We rent daily, weekly, monthly. Place is literally a shit-hole. Am the only employee. 

Edit - some pics http://imgur.com/a/0shoz
